name: 資訊科技創新推廣
description: The goal of this course is to examine the change process of technological innovations in schools and our society. A basic premise is that “planning” for change and “facilitating” the process can be done to a great degree. This course will be organized around two major paradigms: (1) the diffusion of innovations (DoI) perspective and (2) the concerns-based adoptions model (CBAM) perspective.
goals: 了解資訊科技融入教學的理論與實務
了解資訊科技融入教學的實施策略並評量其成效
說明數位學習之評量法與重點
應用數位學習專案管理方法進行學習管理
積極主動提供推動組織內、外數位學習之資訊
認同及肯定資訊科技應用於教學之效益
syllabus:
Course Schedule:  
1\. Introduction to Diffusion of Innovations  
2\. What is Diffusion?  
3\. Elements of Diffusion  
4\. Diffusion Research  
5\. The Generation of Innovations  
6. The Innovation-decision Process  
7\. Attributes of Innovation  
8\. Diffusion Networks  
9\. The Change Agent  
10\. Innovation in Organizations  
11\. The Concern-based Approach  
12\. Stages of Concern  
13\. Levels of Use  
14\. Innovation Configuration  
15\. Technology Acceptance Model
